summary: This bill, the Lieutenant General Carey Runway Act of 2025, proposes to name Runway 5L/23R at Marine Corps Air Station, Cherry Point, North Carolina, the Lieutenant General Carey Runway. The bill includes findings detailing the military career of Lieutenant General Richard E. Carey, highlighting his service in the Marine Corps, his awards, and his educational background. The act dictates that all official references to the runway will be updated to reflect the new designation upon enactment.
